title: How to add pictures/DANK MEMES to boards??

replies.body:
you can embed any image into a post by posting the image URL

http://orig06.deviantart.net/fe0e/f/2013/259/5/3/league_of_draven___logo_by_solanaar-d6mjbb0.jpg

This works with any image url e.g. Imugur or puush or just simply right click ---> copy image URL.
use an external site like imgur or puush
